aboutContent:
Nothin' But A Good Time

by Poison

Work 9 to 5 just to pay my rent,

I can barely make it through the week,

Saturday night I'd like to meet my girl,

but right now I can't make ends meet.

 

I'm always workin', slavin' everyday,

Gotta get away from the same old, same old,

I need a chance just to get away,

If you could here me think, this is what I'd say...
